line3: I have seen before. Would you take it to the

Wow! This is incredible! Th-this talisman
line2: you brought me... it is the last piece of
line3: the puzzle. Finally! The legacy of our

line1: I need time to study this. Can you please
line2: can you please perform one task while I
line3: study this talisman? In the mighty city
line4: of Varrock, located north-east of here

line1: is a certain shop that sells magical runes.
line2: I have,  in this package, all of the research I
line3: have done relating to runes, but I require
line4: somebody to take them to a shopkeeper who can

line1: offer me his insights. Do this thing for me,
line2: bring back what he gives you, and, if my suspicions
line3: are correct, I will let you in on one of the
line4: greatest secrets this world has ever known. It

line1: is a secret so powerful that it destroyed the
line2: original Wizards' Tower many centuries ago!
line3: Do this thing for me and you will be rewarded.

line1: Yes, certainly.
line2: No, I'm busy.

line1: Welcome, adventurer, to the world-renowned
line2: Wizards' Tower. How may I help you?

line1: How goes your quest? Have you delivered the research
line2: notes to my friend yet?

line1: Yes, I have. He gave me some research notes
line2: to pass on to you.

line1: May I have them?
Sure. I have them here.
You have been nothing but helpful, adventurer.
line2: In return, I can let you in on the secret
line3: of our research. Many centuries ago, the
line4: wizards of the Wizards' Tower learnt the

line1: secret of creating runes, which allowed
line2: them to cast magic very easily. But, when
line3: the tower was burnt down, the secret of
line4: creating runes was lost with it...or so

line1: I thought. Some months ago, while searching
line2: these ruins for information, I came upon
line3: a scroll that made reference to a magical
line4: rock, deep in the ice fields of the north.

line1: This rock was called the 'rune essence'
line2: by those magicians who studied its powers.
line3: Apparently, by simply breaking a chunk from
line4: it, a rune could be fashioned and taken

line1: to certain magical altars that were scattered
line2: across the land. Now, this is an interesting
line3: little piece of history, but not much use
line4: to us since we do not have access to this

line1: rune essence or these altars. This is where
line2: you and Aubury come in. A little while ago,
line3: Aubury discovered a parchment detailing
line4: a teleportation spell that he had never

line1: come across before. When cast, it took him
line2: to a strange rock, yet it felt strangely
line3: familiar. As I'm sure you have guessed,
line4: he had discovered a spell to the mythical

line1: rune essence. As soon as he told me of this,
line2: I saw the importance of the find. For, if
line3: we could find the altars spoken of in the
line4: ancient texts, we would once more be able

line1: to create runes as our ancestors had done.
I'm still not sure how I fit into this little
line2: story of yours.

line1: You haven't guessed? This talisman you brought
line2: me is a key to the elemental altar of air!
line3: When you hold it, it directs you to the
line4: entrance of the long-forgotten Air Altar.

line1: By bringing pieces of the rune essence to
line2: the Air Altar, you will be able to fashion
line3: your own air runes. That's not all! By finding
line4: other talismans similar to this one, you

line1: will eventually be able to craft every rune
line2: that is available in this world, just as
line3: our ancestors did. I cannot stress enough
line4: what a find this is! Now, due to the risks

line1: involved in letting this mighty power fall
line2: into the wrong hands, I will try to keep
line3: the teleport spell to the rune essence a
line4: closely guarded secret. This means that,

line1: if any evil power should discover the talismans
line2: required to enter the elemental temples,
line3: we should be able to prevent their access
line4: to the runes essence. I know not where the

line1: altars are located, nor do I know where
line2: the talismans have been scattered, but I
line3: now return your air talisman. Find the Air
line4: Altar and you will be able to craft your

line1: blank runes into air runes at will. Any
line2: time you wish to visit the rune essence,
line3: speak to me or Aubury and we will open a

line1: portal to that mystical place.
So, only you and Aubury know the teleport
line2: spell to the rune essence?

line1: No, there are others. When you speak to
line2: them, they will know you and grant you access
line3: to that place when asked. Use the air talisman
line4: to locate the Air Altar and use any further

line1: talismans you find to locate the other altars.
Now, my research notes, please?
You give the research notes to Sedridor.
He gives you an air talisman.
